The ParentCoach app needs to gather and use certain information about its users. Thus, this policy describes how this personal data must be collected, handled and stored to meet the company‚Äôs data protection standards ‚Äî and to comply with the law.

This data protection policy ensures that the chatbot ParentCoach: Complies with data protection law and follow good practice. Protects the rights of collaborators, users and partners. Is transparent about how it stores and processes users‚Äô data. Protects itself from the risks of data breach.

The General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 describes how organizations ‚Äî including the app ParentCoach ‚Äî must collect, handle and store personal information. POPIA ACT SA These rules apply regardless of whether data is stored electronically, on paper or on other materials. To comply with the law, personal information must be collected and used fairly, stored safely and not disclosed unlawfully.

The ParentCoach app needs to gather and use certain information about its users. Thus, this policy describes how this personal data must be collected, handled and stored to meet the company‚Äôs data protection standards ‚Äî and to comply with the law.

This data protection policy guarantees that the ParentCoach chatbot: Complies with data protection law and follows good practice. Protects the rights of collaborators, users and partners. Is transparent about how it stores and processes user data. Protects itself from the risks of data breaches.

The General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 describes how organisations - including the chatbot ParentCoach, led by Fraunhofer AICOS - must collect, process and store personal information. These rules apply regardless of whether the data is stored electronically, on paper or on other materials. To comply with the law, personal information must be collected and used fairly, stored securely and not disclosed unlawfully.
At ParentCoach, we collect and manage user data according to the following Privacy Policy.

We collect information you provide directly to us. For example, we collect information when you create an account, subscribe, participate in any interactive features of our services, fill out a form, request support or otherwise communicate with us. The types of information we may collect include your name, email address and other contact or identifying information you choose to provide. We collect anonymous data from every visitor that logs to the app to monitor traffic and fix bugs. For example, we collect information like web requests, the data sent in response to such requests, the Internet Protocol address, the browser type, the browser language, and a timestamp for the request. We also use various technologies to collect information, and this may include sending cookies to your computer. Cookies are small data files stored on your hard drive or in your device memory that helps us to improve our services and your experience, see which areas and features of our services are popular and count visits. We may also collect information using web beacons (also known as \"tracking pixels\"). Web beacons are electronic images that may be used in our services or emails and to track count visits or understand usage and campaign effectiveness. Our Privacy Policy was created with the help of the Privacy Policy Template Generator.
At ParentCoach, we collect and manage user data in accordance with the following Privacy Policy.

We collect information that the user provides to us directly. For example, we collect information when you create an account, subscribe, participate in any interactive features of our services, fill in a form, request support or communicate with us in any other way. The types of information we may collect include your name, email address and other contact or identification information you choose to provide.
Adcock Ingram Depression and Anxiety Helpline: 0800708090
Adcock Ingram Depression and Anxiety Helpline offers emotional support to people in South Africa who are in distress or at risk of suicide.
South Africa Suicide Crisis Helpline offers 24-hour support to people in South Africa who are in distress or at risk of suicide.
